remark.ch: 初級課程，限修過西語一A。

goal.en: "On successful completion of this course, students will be able to 1、 500 conjugations, including regular and irregular, tenses including the present tense, past tense, future tense, perfect and so a total of 12 categories 2、 Well understanding on Spanish grammars. 3、 Practicing various themes on conversation via groups’ interactions 4、 Composition writing in Spanish 5、 Bringing stories and encouraging students reports of Spanish & Latino culture, music and contemporary society to stimulate students’ interest Guiding students to close local Spanish themes for multi-cultures learning and approach to global market"
goal.ch: "研修此課程的學生，將獲得如下的學習經歷： 1、 學習動詞變化500個，包括規則動詞及不規則動詞，時態變化包括現在式，過去式，未來式，完成式等共12類 2、 基本句型的熟練運用，進而將西文名詞、形容詞及動詞，套用在各式句型，學生可以靈活應用西文在會話造句上 3、 平常上課小組實地練習會話，提升學生的西班牙實務對話經驗 4、 西文作文朗讀及寫作練習 5、 隨課程內容彈性增加、並鼓勵小組報告西班牙與拉丁美洲文化、音樂、當代社會的解說，提高學生學習西班牙文的樂趣 導引學生接觸台灣在地的西班牙風情、西班牙企業，在英語之外，接受多語文的認知與學習，向全球化職場邁出第一步。"

content.en:
"This semester is second part of full annual program. The course is designed on teaching material with bilinguals in Spanish & English and Oral teaching in Chinese. Some Chinese material is provided at class too. At the first semester, students will learn from pronunciation into subjects-learning as following:Pronunciation and spelling. (El alfabeto y la pronunciacion): Vowel and Consonants, Syllabification, Accentuation, Punctuation and Capitalization.
The 1st Chapter: Getting Around Town-Where is it? the grammar topics: the use of HAY and SER/Articles and Gender of Nouns/ Question Formation/Negative Sentence/Plural Nouns/Compound Nouns/ Noun Phrases)The 2nd Chapter: Describing Places and Thingsthe grammar topics: Agreement of Adjectives/ position of Adjectives/Short Forms of Adjectives/ Ser to be/ Contraction DEL/ possessive Adjectives/ Question Formation/ the use of emphasize/Noun phrase functions.The 3rd Chapter: Nationalities, Professions, Food, and Films.the grammar topics: Subject pronouns/ SER to be/ Adjectives of Nationality/ ?QU?! in exclamations- information Questions/YES or No questions/ Negative sentence/ position of Adjectives/prepositions/demonstrative adjectives/ gender of Nouns that referThe 4th Chapter: Describing People, Emotions, and Health. the grammar topics: the use of ESTAR and SER/ adverbs of places with prepositions/Tag questions/ ESTAR+past participle:Expressing positions of the body/SER and ESTAR in Yes or No questions."
content.ch: 本課程設計為全學年西班牙文的下學期之3學分，採取英、西文雙語教材、上學期以中文授課，搭配教師課堂間提供之中文教材。上學期由發音理論入門同時與課程用書主題性章節內搭配學習，主要動詞HAY, SER, ESTAR的活用。下學期進入規則及不規則動詞變化，加上時態從現在式邁向過去式，以及各場景之應用，強化閱讀和朗讀之能力。
